gaia::core::WidgetConfiguration Class Reference

Contains methods to standard constants used in the UI for timeouts, sizes, and distances. More...

WidgetConfigurationProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

Contains methods to standard constants used in the UI for timeouts, sizes, and distances.

Definition at line 37 of file WidgetConfiguration.h.

anonymous enum [private]

Defines the duration in milliseconds we will wait to see if a touch event is a tap or a scroll.

If the user does not move within this interval, it is considered to be a tap.

Enumerator:
TAP_TIMEOUT
